channel.title: Project Eclipse Client and Server
channel.description:
Hello I've been working on a Devolution based server for a couple weeks now and I just wanted to share with you what I have accomplished and what are my future hopes for the server. Keep in mind that this is my first server I have coded, but i have coded other servers like Figmentscape just for practice. Well lets take a look What I have done so far: Started making Lost City and Dragon Slayer quest I'm using a few amount of commands (less junk the better) Thinking about making small Treasure Trail Added Vengeance with real skull A portal room Working on Godwars (almost finished) Working on small summoning (just basic use the pouch, it summons monster, you gain experience and you have to have a certain summon level to summon monsters. Working on Low and High level assault minigames (almost finished) My custom Partyhat Minigame Improved Npc and player dialogues Cleaned up a bit and removed unneccisary junk Fixed attacking npc problem with Devolution 7.0 Added a Gnome Glider system Working on a RS-like barrows Removed starter (you recieve a bronze sword, wooden shield and guide book on first login) Removed Premium member Working on new training area (havent started yet) Added a small skill menu for combat skills Working on Mage Training area
Progress With Client: Added Vengeance skull Added multiway frame Added Bronze to Dragon defenders Added some summoning monsters Put logout door in upper right hand corner (still need to add sprite) Added Bandos and Saradomin Godwars General Added some summoning pouches (thanks to SilentCJ) Added bunch of new items and Npcs Attempting to add the new options, lunar and Emote interface (once I figure out to do the tutorial - i'm not really experienced with clients) Added Halo Vehicles (thanks to Cocoa) Added Warrior Guild Animator and Animated armours (again thanks to Cocoa) And more to come
Now keep in mind I'm not that experienced with coding so please don't flame. Thanks for viewing. Oh and on a side note could anyone explain how to add new interfaces to a Client? I don't really understand Meanz interface tutorial on R.U.N.E ~ S.E.R.V.E.R. Thanks

item.title: Project Eclipse Client and Server
item.dc:creator: @gobabygo6 gobabygo6
item.description:
@gobabygo6 wrote:

dude. can you give me a code and model for halo vehicles please? so far i have energy swords and im working on making a holo like landscape. maybe a halo version of clan wars ? idk im a newbie coder and i cant even find the right server to start building on so please help. PM me or something it would really help to have the vehicles

please and thank you
-Cole Snydle

Read full topic

item.title: Project Eclipse Client and Server
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Hello I’ve been working on a Devolution based server for a couple weeks now and I just wanted to share with you what I have accomplished and what are my future hopes for the server. Keep in mind that this is my first server I have coded, but i have coded other servers like Figmentscape just for practice. Well lets take a look
What I have done so far:
Started making Lost City and Dragon Slayer quest
I’m using a few amount of commands (less junk the better)
Thinking about making small Treasure Trail
Added Vengeance with real skull
A portal room
Working on Godwars (almost finished)
Working on small summoning (just basic use the pouch, it summons monster, you gain experience and you have to have a certain summon level to summon monsters.
Working on Low and High level assault minigames (almost finished)
My custom Partyhat Minigame
Improved Npc and player dialogues
Cleaned up a bit and removed unneccisary junk
Fixed attacking npc problem with Devolution 7.0
Added a Gnome Glider system
Working on a RS-like barrows
Removed starter (you recieve a bronze sword, wooden shield and guide book on first login)
Removed Premium member
Working on new training area (havent started yet)
Added a small skill menu for combat skills
Working on Mage Training area

Progress With Client:
Added Vengeance skull
Added multiway frame
Added Bronze to Dragon defenders
Added some summoning monsters
Put logout door in upper right hand corner (still need to add sprite)
Added Bandos and Saradomin Godwars General
Added some summoning pouches (thanks to SilentCJ)
Added bunch of new items and Npcs
Attempting to add the new options, lunar and Emote interface (once I figure out to do the tutorial - i’m not really experienced with clients)
Added Halo Vehicles (thanks to Cocoa)
Added Warrior Guild Animator and Animated armours (again thanks to Cocoa)
And more to come

Now keep in mind I’m not that experienced with coding so please don’t flame. Thanks for viewing.
Oh and on a side note could anyone explain how to add new interfaces to a Client? I don’t really understand Meanz interface tutorial on R.U.N.E ~ S.E.R.V.E.R. Thanks

Read full topic
